awd_abstract_narration: The National Distance Learning Center (NDLC) at Owensboro                  Community College is establishing a connection to NSFNET via an                 existing 1.544 million bits per second line through the University              of Kentucky and the SURANET mid-level network.  The connection                  enables the research and education community to access the NDLC                 database over the Internet as well as by modem, as is done now.                 Owensboro's faculty and students will also be able to communicate               and collaborate with the international scientific and educational               community, and to access network resources such as libraries,                   databases and supercomputers.  This award funds part of the costs               for two years.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
